system.description: Ferret CMS provides a simple yet powerful Content Management System for creating small- to medium-sized websites. The default configuration is designed to meet many of the specific needs of most corporate presentation sites. It is easy to use for the non-technical user and simple to install and administer, while still being flexible and powerful for the developer. Ferret CMS is based on Zope (http://www.zope.org/). It's main advantage over other content management systems available for Zope and in general is that the administration backend is simple and easy to use, and configuration is very simple. A fully functional site (sans content) can be set up within five minutes and the visual configuration can be done by any developer with basic-to-intermediate knowledge of Zope programming.
